name: Memory of Azov
description:
MEMORY OF AZOV is a third person adventure inspired by Luigi's Mansion, in which we carry a flashlight instead of a vacuum cleaner.

The game takes place at the Winter Palace of Saint Petersburg, in Russia. After the fall of the Romanov family, the palace has been abandoned and is still under the curse of Rasputin; that's why it's full of ghosts. It also preserves all the treasures of the family, including several Fabergé eggs. Niko, our protagonist, believes that she’s the legitimate heir of one of these eggs, the 'Memory of Azov', and that is why she enters the haunted palace to recover it.
